note.p: Birth: Paris, France (13, 16 or 26 August 1643, or 1645)
Death: Paris, France (08 May 1794)
Research Field: Chemistry, physiology, geology, economics, social reform
Career: Farmer-general; his explanation of calcination and combustion has led him to be considered a founder of modern chemistry; guillotined
Memberships: Academy of Sciences, Paris (1768)
Membership: Fellow
Election Date: 3/04/1788
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DSB
